snippet: The mood at the birthday party for John C. Liu, the city comptroller, which also served as a fund-raiser, was cheery despite the shadow of a widening federal investigation into Mr. Liu's campaign finance operation.
abstract: The mood at the birthday party for John C. Liu, the city comptroller, which also served as a fund-raiser, was cheery despite the shadow of a widening federal investigation into Mr. Liu's campaign finance operation.

byline.original: By DANIEL E. SLOTNIK and DAVID W. CHEN

lead_paragraph: As birthday parties go, turning 45 usually doesn't mean a lot. But it sure did for John C. Liu, the city comptroller.

headline.main: Amid Inquiry, Liu Marks His Birthday With a Fund-Raiser
